author: The Plain Bagel
description:
Last weekend, the US captured Venezuelan dictator Nicolas Maduro and made moves to secure the country's oil. Today we'll discuss the feasibility of building out Venezuela's oil industry, and the risk it poses to Canada as a key oil supplier to the US.

DISCLAIMER:

title: The Venezuela Oil Grab - What it Means for Canada
